entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
